field.name: description
field.value: Can't proxy nested generic interfaces. Specifically, trying to do so with IList<T> result in an error. When I am testing with my InterfaceGeneratorWithoutTarget, I get "Type handle 'System.Collections.Generic.IList`1[T]' and method handle with declaring type 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1[System.Int32]' are incompatible. Get RuntimeMethodHandle and declaring RuntimeTypeHandle off the same MethodBase.", when I use InterfaceGeneratoWithTarget, I get: "Could not find a matching method on System.Collections.Generic.List`1. Method CopyTo".
